pullrequest.title: issue #857: fix segfault for simbody screw joint when setting limits due to uninitialized limitForce.

content.raw: To test this, I created branch `issue_857` off of the `joint_set_param` branch and enabled a failing portion of `INTEGRATION_joint_spawn` (a01c0c1), which causes the test to fail. I then merged with this branch (9bc8a22), which allowed the test to progress farther, though it still fails. I'm going to move the specifics of my testing to the #857 discussion page.
